  • Interfaces
    Class
    Description
    BlockClickedListener
    The Block Clicked listener is used to handle the event when a block in a GameBoard is clicked.
    CommunicationsListener
    The Communications Listener is used for listening to messages received by the communicator.
    GameEndListener
    The GameEndListener listens to when the game has ended and handles what happens afterwards
    GameLoopListener
    The GameLoopListener listens to when the game has to loop (when the timer runs out) and syncs the UI timer to the game timer
    LineClearedListener
    The LineClearedListener listens to when a line is cleared and handles what happens
    MultiplayerGameEndListener
    The MultiplayerGameEndListener listens to when the game has ended and handles what happens afterwards
    NextPieceListener
    The NextPieceListener handles the event when a new piece needs to be displayed on a PieceBoard
    ReceiveMessageListener
    The ReceiveMessageListener interface provides a method that will handle the change of the text element in a scene based off of the received message from the server
    RightClickedListener
    The RightClickedListener is used to handle the way that a right click is treated
    ScoreChangedListener
    The ScoreChangedListener listens to when the score of the player has changed and carries out the needed checks relating to the highs-core
